Officials of Czech Embassy Enjoy Acrobatic Performance
articles.content:
Officials of Czech Embassy Enjoy Acrobatic Performance 
    Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Charge d' Affaires Miroslav Podhajsky and staff members of the Czech embassy here watched an acrobatic performance at the Pyongyang Circus Theatre on Oct. 26 on the occasion of the Czech national day.
 Enjoying it together with the guests were officials concerned and working people and school youth and children in the city.    
 The performance was acclaimed by the spectators for its high artistic merit and refined skill of the acrobats.

Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from New Cuban Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from New Cuban Ambassador
    Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Ruben Perez Valdes, Cuban ambassador e.p. to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.
 Present there were Choe Su Hon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and staff members of the Cuban embassy here.    
 The president conversed with the ambassador after receiving the credentials.

Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Pong Ae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Pong Ae
    Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il Wednesday sent a wreath to the bier of People's Actress Kim Pong Ae, teacher at Pyongyang Circus School, expressing deep condolences over her death.
